participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, Oliver is passionate about luxury and has a strong sense of style. He is somewhat introverted but is driven in his professional life.
participant_1.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is laid-back and enjoys the simple things in life, but she has a strong passion for cars. She is social and outgoing but struggles with long-term commitments.
participant_2.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.
